info.title: Gannet JSON-RPC API
info.description: Gannet is an API for booking flights, hotels, and more. Uses JSON-RPC 2.0 protocol.

methods.name: token:create
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials and returns a JWT token for subsequent API calls.

methods.name: flight:schedule:list
methods.description: Returns available flight schedules with fare information for the specified route, date, and passenger count.

params.name: carriers
params.description: List of airline carrier codes to search (e.g., ['QG', 'GA'])

params.name: schedules
params.description: List of route searches (origin, destination, dates)

methods.name: flight:schedule:fare
methods.summary: Get detailed fare breakdown for selected flights
methods.description: Returns detailed fare information including tax breakdown for the selected flight schedule and fare class.

methods.name: flight:book
methods.description: Creates a flight booking (PNR) with passenger details for the selected schedule and fare.

params.name: info
params.description: Booking information including contact and passenger details

methods.name: flight:sync
methods.description: Retrieves the current status and details of an existing flight booking.

methods.name: flight:issue
methods.description: Issues tickets for an existing flight booking. Converts a booked PNR to issued tickets.

methods.name: flight:cancel
methods.description: Cancels an existing flight booking. Only booked (not issued) bookings can be cancelled.

methods.name: hotel:destinations:list
methods.description: Returns a list of hotel destinations matching the search term.

methods.name: hotel:searchby:destination
methods.description: Returns available hotels for a destination with room count and dates.

methods.name: hotel:fetch:detail
methods.description: Returns detailed information about a hotel including facilities, amenities, and photos.

methods.name: hotel:fetch:rooms
methods.summary: Get available rooms for a hotel
methods.description: Returns available rooms with pricing and cancellation policies for a specific hotel.

params.name: agentCodes
params.description: List of agent codes to get pricing for

methods.name: hotel:room:checkprice
methods.description: Verifies current pricing for selected rooms before booking.

params.name: roomSelectedData
params.description: Selected room data for price check

methods.name: hotel:book
methods.description: Creates a hotel booking with guest details for the selected rooms.

methods.name: hotel:fetch:booking
methods.description: Retrieves the details of an existing hotel booking.

methods.name: hotel:issue
methods.description: Issues a voucher for an existing hotel booking, confirming the reservation.

methods.name: hotel:cancel
methods.description: Cancels an existing hotel booking. Cancellation charges may apply based on policy.

ResultTime.description: Timing information for the API request/response

Result.description: Standard result object included in all API responses

errors.description: List of error messages (present when status is ERROR)

SupplairCode.description: Supplier air code for flight services (e.g., 'PGS')

OperatingCarrierInfo.description: Operating carrier information with operational suffix

returnDate.description: Return date in YYYY-MM-DD format (null for one-way)

Journey.description: Journey information linking origin to destination through segments

segmentIDS.description: List of segment IDs comprising this journey

Segment.description: Flight segment representing one continuous flight

departureDateTime.description: Departure date and time in ISO 8601 format

arrivalDateTime.description: Arrival date and time in ISO 8601 format

legIDS.description: List of leg IDs within this segment

Leg.description: Flight leg representing takeoff to landing (smallest flight unit)

FreeCheckinBaggage.description: Free check-in baggage information for a specific route

Offer.description: Fare offer for a specific passenger type

AgentOffersFare.description: Agent-specific fare offers from a supplier

isSupportNKRI.description: Whether NKRI (domestic Indonesian) pricing is supported

offers.description: List of fare offers per passenger type

Fare.description: Fare class details with availability and pricing

canBuyAdditionalBaggage.description: Whether additional baggage can be purchased

SegmentFare.description: Available fares for a specific segment

Schedule.description: Flight schedule with associated fare information

FlightScheduleInfo.description: Flight schedule information containing journeys, segments, and legs

JourneySegmentFareSelection.description: Journey-level segment fare selection for booking

ScheduleFareDetailRequest.description: Request parameters for getting fare details

FareTax.description: Individual tax component of a fare

FarePrice.description: Complete fare price breakdown with taxes

FareComponent.description: Fare component linking fare class to segment

FareDetail.description: Detailed fare information for a passenger

FareSummary.description: Summary totals for all fares in a booking

dob.description: Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format

FlightBookingInfo.description: Booking information including contact and passengers

BookingSummary.description: Financial summary of a flight booking

FlightPNR.description: Flight PNR (Passenger Name Record) with complete booking details

destinationKey.description: Unique encrypted destination key for hotel search

SearchKeyData.description: Encrypted search key data for subsequent hotel requests

LowestPrice.description: Lowest available price for a hotel

AgentSellingPrice.description: Agent-specific selling price for a hotel

RoomCancellationCharge.description: Cancellation charge for a date range

roomCancellationCharges.description: List of cancellation charges by date

amenities.description: List of amenities in this group

RoomInformation.description: Room information in hotel search/fetch results

roomBoardCode.description: Board code (e.g., 'RO' for Room Only, 'BDBF' for Breakfast)

RoomIndexCombination.description: Room index combination for multi-room bookings

roomIndexSequence.description: Sequence of room indices that can be booked together

RoomCombinationType.description: Type of room combination for booking

HotelRoomInformation.description: Hotel room information response from fetch:rooms

RoomSelectedData.description: Selected room data for booking/check price

RoomGuestData.description: Room guest data for hotel booking

SupplierInformation.description: Hotel supplier information in booking response

VendorInformation.description: Hotel vendor information in booking response

HotelBookingRoomInfo.description: Room information in hotel booking response

HotelBookingResponse.description: Hotel booking response (used for book, issue, cancel, fetch:booking)
